refactor: move build.smoke.test.ts to standard test location (HODGE-307)

## What Changed
- **Test Organization** (2 files modified, 57 lines net change)
  - Deleted `.claude/commands/build.smoke.test.ts` (45 lines removed)
  - Moved to `src/lib/claude-commands.smoke.test.ts` (12 lines modified)
  - Updated 5 import paths from `join(__dirname, 'build.md')` to `join(__dirname, '../../.claude/commands/build.md')`
  - Removed buildTemplatePath constant optimization in favor of inline path resolution

## Why This Change
The build.smoke.test.ts file was created in `.claude/commands/` during HODGE-306,
but this violated the project's established test organization pattern. All 23 other
smoke tests in the codebase are located in `src/` or `test/` directories, following
a clear separation of concerns: `.claude/commands/` is for AI assistant documentation,
while `src/lib/` is for code and tests.

This refactoring establishes the correct pattern before it can proliferate to other
command template tests.
